sentences.sContent: She’s the team’s most consistent player.
sentences.sCn: 她是该队中表现最为稳定的选手。

sentences.sContent: ...That relative strength would be consistent with what was seen in the wider retail industry during early part of the holiday season...

synos.tran: 始终如一的，[数]一致的；坚持的

remMethod.val: consist(一致) ＋ ent(…的) → 一致的

trans.tranCn: 坚持的， 一贯的； 一致的， 符合的
trans.tranOther: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval
